THIS-758 Extends neat.read.rdf.instances() with optional named_graph parameter (#1316)

# Description

Extends neat.read.rdf.instances() with optional named_graph parameter
to specify which named graph to load RDF data into.

## Bump

- [x] Patch
- [ ] Minor
- [ ] Skip

## Changelog
### Added
- Add named_graph parameter to read.rdf.instances() to support loading
RDF data into named graphs
